BonusSpellFeature.Name: Chains of Carceri
BonusSpellFeature.Text: You can cast hold monster at will—targeting a celestial, fiend, or elemental—without expending a spell slot or material components. You must finish a long rest before you can use this invocation on the same creature again.
BonusSpellFeature.Prerequisite: 15th level, Pact of the Chain feature
